text: Ezɨ Aisaia Hesekian akam baregha, kamaghɨn gumazir an akam inigha izir kabav gei, “Ia uamategh atrivim bagh mangɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akamɨn gun a mɨkemegh. Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, ‘Nɨ akar a nan tiraghtirazir kam, mɨghɨgh a gɨnɨghnɨgh atiatingan markɨ. A pura Asirian atrivimɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnim, a mɨgɨrɨgɨar kam gami.
